Cluster Size Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Double-click or right-click an Array to Cluster function on the block diagram and select Cluster Size from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to specify the number of elements the Array to Cluster function pulls out of the array when converting an array to a cluster. Because the size of a cluster is a fixed value, you must specify the number of elements in the cluster.

  • Number of elements in cluster—Specifies the number of elements in the cluster the Array to Cluster function defines. The number of elements must be between 1 and 256. The default is 9. If you configure the Array to Cluster function with more cluster elements than are actually in the array when the function executes, LabVIEW pads the cluster with appropriate default data.
